senses.de: A person who manages a home as a job including cleaning and shopping.
senses.ex: She was hired as a housekeeper to take care of the daily chores and maintenance of the house.

Tips.title: Not a Guest
Tips.description: A housekeeper is part of the staff, not a member of the family or a visitor.
Tips.example: The housekeeper has her own room in the quarters downstairs.

Tips.title: Job Variation
Tips.description: Their tasks vary; some may cook, others might not, depending on the agreement.
Tips.example: Our housekeeper is in charge of grocery shopping and laundry.

Tips.title: Professional Boundaries
Tips.description: It's a paid position with set responsibilities and hours, filtering out personal favors.
Tips.example: The housekeeper scheduled her cleaning duties from 9 to 5.

senses.de: A person employed by a hotel or inn to manage domestic duties and, sometimes, to have charge of female servants.
senses.ex: As a housekeeper at the hotel, she ensures all rooms are clean and ready for guests.

Tips.title: Hotel Hierarchy
Tips.description: In hotels, housekeepers can have different levels, from entry to chief housekeeper.
Tips.example: She was promoted from a cleaning maid to a housekeeper position.

Tips.title: Service Focus
Tips.description: Hotel housekeepers focus on guest satisfaction and room standards.
Tips.example: The housekeeper checks that all hotel rooms have clean towels and toiletries.

Tips.title: Not Personal Staff
Tips.description: A hotel housekeeper is not personal to a guest; they provide service to many rooms.
Tips.example: The housekeeper is responsible for maintaining the cleanliness of 20 different rooms daily.

Caretaker.wordDefinition:
A caretaker is someone who looks after a certain property, such as a large estate or a public park. Their duties typically involve maintenance and upkeep of the property, as well as security and making sure everything is in order.

A caretaker looks after a property while a housekeeper looks after a living space.

Clean.wordDefinition:
Clean refers to the act of making something free from dirt, dust, and other unwanted substances.

It can be used in various contexts like cleaning a room, cleaning dishes, or cleaning clothes.

A housekeeper is a person who is responsible for keeping a house clean and organized. Their duties can include cleaning, laundry, cooking, shopping, and other household tasks.

Clean describes the action of removing dirt from something, while a housekeeper is a person who is responsible for keeping a home clean and organized.

Custodian.wordDefinition:
A custodian is responsible for maintaining and cleaning a building, usually a school, office, or hospital. They ensure that common areas such as hallways, bathrooms, and classrooms are clean, safe, and well-maintained.

The main difference is that a custodian works in a larger public or commercial building, while a housekeeper works in a private home.

Governess.wordDefinition:
A governess is a woman who is employed to teach and educate children in a private household. She is responsible for their education, manners, and behavior.

A governess focuses on teaching and education of children, while a housekeeper focuses on managing the household and domestic staff.

Governesses are typically needed when a family has children who need specialized education, while housekeepers are needed to manage the daily upkeep of a household.

Housemaid.wordDefinition:
A housemaid typically performs more specific cleaning duties, such as dusting, vacuuming, doing laundry, and general tidying up.

A housekeeper is more of a general manager for a household, while a housemaid is a specific cleaner.

Maid.wordDefinition:
Maid usually refers to a person who is specifically hired to clean and tidy up a home or a commercial space.

A maid may be responsible for tasks such as sweeping, vacuuming, dusting, washing dishes and laundry, and making beds.

A housekeeper is responsible for managing and maintaining a household, while a maid is responsible for cleaning and tidying up a space.

Stewardess.wordDefinition:
A stewardess is a person who works on board a ship, aircraft, or other transportation vehicles to ensure the comfort and safety of passengers.

Stewardess or Flight Attendant is a term used specifically for women in the airline industry.

A housekeeper is a person who works in a household to keep it clean and organized and a stewardess is a person who works on transportation vehicles to ensure that the passengers are safe and comfortable during their journey.

videos.Text: They need solidarity, because they're behind some of the most exciting social justice movements out there today. The nannies and housekeepers who marched with their families and their employers' families -- their activism got us an international treaty on domestic workers' rights.

videos.Title: Surprises Ahead PIPE...

videos.Text: You are Mari the housekeeper. He's told me of you.
videos.Title: Visit Her at Your Peril...

quotes.Text: God bless my mother - she's long gone now, but she'd work all day and go to school at night. She started out in life as a housekeeper at 15 years old, totally on her own, and she retired as a college professor. But there were some hard times. It's not easy for a woman who's only trying to do the best for her kid but who could never be home.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Jonathan Banks

quotes.Text: I met this woman who was a hundred, this housekeeper, a hundred years old. I interviewed her. She just told me about her whole life. She's like, 'I can't read, I can't write; I can tell you who I was working for, and I can tell you the year, but who was president?
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Tate Taylor

quotes.Text: My mom worked as a housekeeper, and I saw her relationship with her employers - how on the one hand she spent more time with these women than with a lot of her friends, and how in certain ways they were friends. But then they weren't.
quotes.Title: American Novelist
quotes.Name: Jesmyn Ward

quotes.Text: One summer I was made housekeeper to my own family, making menus and shopping lists. It was my mother's idea of teaching me to be a grown-up. The main thing I remember is my father being so delighted to get roast duck.
quotes.Title: South African Chef
quotes.Name: Prue Leith

quotes.Text: The only advantage of not being too good a housekeeper is that your guests are so pleased to feel how very much better they are.
quotes.Title: American First Lady
quotes.Name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.Text: The one thing that makes me feel super lucky about my financial success is that I have a housekeeper.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Gwen Stefani

quotes.Text: In Hollywood through the 50s, there were black, English, and Middle European housekeepers and maids.
quotes.Title: American Director
quotes.Name: Bill Condon

quotes.Text: I am a marvelous housekeeper. Every time I leave a man I keep his house.
quotes.Title: Hungarian Actress
quotes.Name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.Text: There's nothing my housekeeper does that I can't do - and maybe better!
quotes.Title: Czechoslovakian Celebrity
quotes.Name: Ivana Trump

quotes.Text: I warn you, I'm a terrible housekeeper.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Grace Lee Boggs
